def match(usefulness, months):
    return "Match!" if sum(usefulness) >= 0.85**months * 100 else "No match!"

def match(usefulness, months):
    return 'Match!' if sum(usefulness) >= 100*0.85**months else 'No match!'

def match(usefulness, months):
    return f"{'M' if sum(usefulness) >= 100 * 0.85**months else 'No m'}atch!"

def match(a, n):
    return "Match!" if sum(a) >= 100 * 0.85**n else "No match!"

def match(usefulness, months):
    return ["Match!", "No match!"][sum(usefulness) < 100 * 0.85 ** months]
